testimonials.quote: This placement generated nearly 1,000 clicks, which is 5x more than the estimated amount of clicks. Those clicks yielded over 105 subscribers.
We ran a sponsorship with Recomendo. It ran very smoothly, and we liked the quality of the newsletter. We also got the amount of clicks expected, which worked out to around $1 a click.
We've received six signups from this sponsorship and one of them already turned into a customer!

We saw 39,512 opens, a 49% open rate, and 233 clicks from this sponsorship with Recomendo. Even though there are no conversions, we are very happy with the performance for the rate and subscriber count.
